full_summary:
================Jackson Smith
Jackson Smith
September 9, 2022

**Government of Canada - Solicitation Notice for Solutions-Based Professional Services**
=====================================================

**Title:** Solutions-Based Professional Services: Project Management Service

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01006629

**Solicitation Number:** T8080-220058
**Date Published:** September 9, 2022
**Closing Date and Time:** October 13, 2022, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
 
The Government of Canada invites bids for professional services from experienced and qualified consulting firms for a Project Management Service Requirement, as part of the Solutions-Based Professional Services (TSPS) initiative managed by Transport Canada. 

**Description of Requirement**
---------------------------

The chosen consulting firm and their sub-consultants will be required to provide expert advice on railway planning, engineering, and operations, as well as transportation project business case development. Their services shall include the following:

* Analyzing present and future rail passenger demand in the Southern Ontario region
* Evaluating existing rail routes, using assessments of operating capacity and infrastructure constraints
* Identifying new alignment options as necessary
* Proposing three service scenarios to improve frequency and reliability of rail services in the southern Toronto-London-Windsor corridor
* Proposing two service scenarios to improve rail services between London and Sarnia

**Security Requirements**
----------------------

The services shall comply with Company Minimum Security Level Required - Reliability and Resource Minimum Security Level Required - Reliability. 

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

The proposed contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCoFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPaFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement

**Associated Documents**
----------------------

 Nil
